tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_requirements (
    requirement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    requirement_name VARCHAR(255),
    requirement_description TEXT,
    requirement_type VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE audits (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    requirement_id INT,
    audit_date DATE,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(100),
    audit_result VARCHAR(50),
    audit_notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (requirement_id) REFERENCES regulatory_requirements(requirement_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceHistory (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  officer_id INT,
  audit_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (officer_id) REFERENCES ComplianceOfficers(officer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (audit_id) REFERENCES Audits(audit_id)
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_requirements (
    requirement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    requirement_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    due_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE audits (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date DATE,
    auditor VARCHAR(255),
    findings TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    requirement_id INT,
    audit_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (requirement_id) REFERENCES regulatory_requirements(requirement_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (audit_id) REFERENCES audits(audit_id)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE user_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
)
